primaryPhoto.description:
He is one of the greatest entertainers of all time. In 2024, Michael Jackson’s unique and unparalleled artistry comes to London’s Prince Edward Theatre direct from Broadway in the multiple Tony Award®-winning new musical MJ THE MUSICAL.
MJ THE MUSICAL will star its original lead actor Myles Frost, who won a Tony Award for his star-making performance.
Winning four of its ten Tony Award nominations, including Best Actor in a Musical and Best Choreography, MJ THE MUSICAL is a celebration of the life and achievements of dearly loved artist Michael Jackson, who is still considered to be one of the greatest entertainers of all time.
Created by two-time Pulitzer Prize winner Lynn Nottage and Tony Award®-winning director/choreographer Christopher Wheeldon, MJ delivers a theatrical experience like no other, electrifying audiences with dozens of the most iconic songs in music history, including Billie Jean, Beat It, Man in the Mirror, Thriller and Smooth Criminal.
Book your MJ THE MUSICAL theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
